post_detail.title: Stride Gum
post_detail.description:
My Contribution:

I led the development of two Facebook applications. The 'Change Your Flavor, Change Your Life' flash execution, which was used to promote Stride SHIFT gum and subsequently the Stride SHIFT Concert Facebook tab, utilized a number of widgets built in HTML and integrated various 3rd party APIs including Foursquare and Youtube.

Execution:

ClickFire Media delivered a customized Facebook tab, ‘Change your flavor, Change your life.’ Over six weeks, a four-man team used Photoshop, FlexBuilder/Flash, Custom PHP and AfterEffects to create the application. Users are invited to watch a video and have the option to become one of four characters - Rodeo Clown, Ostrich Jockey, Adventure Traveler or Fortune Teller - by inserting a picture of themselves through file upload, Facebook album or webcam capture. Once the user customizes their photo, the images are placed in a photo album on their personal Facebook page and published to their news feed.
